name: DragonWingsVR
description: Are you ready to soar to dizzying heights on the back of a majestic dragon? Take your place among the world’s elite dragon riders at the Challenger Cliffs and earn your glory!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 970 or AMD Radeon™ R9 290, equivalent or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows™ 7 SP1, Windows™ 8.1 or later or Windows™ 10 Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: recommended
